revised_title: Botanical and Zoological Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: This article discusses the botanical and zoological collections made in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in 1874-75. The author, George Dickie, focuses on the various plant species, particularly algae, and their distribution in both hemispheres. He also mentions the zoological findings from these expeditions.
